description: The man and woman, now standing, looking at a TV screen.
text:
Man: Hey, look! A new show.
Woman: Let's watch it.

description: The man and woman sitting on the couch again, watching the TV screen.
text:
Man: This is so good!
Woman: I know, right?

description: The man and woman, now lying on the couch, still watching the TV screen.
text:
Man: I could watch this all day.
Woman: Me too.

description: The man and woman, now asleep on the couch, the TV still on.
The man and woman, now awake, sitting on the couch, looking at each other.
text:
Man: That was a great show.
Woman: I know, right?
